nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Solved Rubix Prism\",\"color\":\"aqua\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Quest Item\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Bring it to \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Juliette \",\"color\":\"yellow\"},{\"text\":\"in \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"The Park\",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\".\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"It took hard work and patience, but\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"that's what love is all about!\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"* \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true},{\"text\":\"Co-op Soulbound \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"*\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"SOLVED_PRISM"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{},"minecraft:profile":{"properties":{"textures":[{"value":""}]},"name":"textures"}}}
